review: Difficult to understand...u don't get what u think u get...you have to pay for most of what u want. Not really worth it

review: Great product.  Just wish i could get other channels that the other streaming services offer

review: Why did we wait so long to get this? Best purchase!

review: I want to give it 5 stars but video cuts out sometimes. Especially with sling TV and hulu plus. And I know its not my internet because my chromecast is smooth as butter. But still love it.

review: Very easy to set up! I love it.

review: This is a very convenient and cheaper alternative to cable!

review: Love the Fire TV Stick. Faster and more user friendly than my WiFi Blu-Ray player.

review: I use this every single day and love it.

review: My husband loves the fire stick. Makes a smart tv out of his tv.

review: Works very well, and the price is affordable.  Gets a lot of stations/movie choices.  The remote is responsive.  No complaints at all.
